Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Qaran qanxixa waqdi, (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Kaadu isi Rabbih ayti yaceeh, kay amri oggolam cakkik kaal tan
Kaadu baaxó fidsimtaah, farakka itta waqdi
Kaadu tet addat tanim qambissaah, foyyah kak raqta
Kaadu isi Rabbih ayti taceeh, kay amri oggoltam cakkik teetil tan
Kee ta seehadaytow diggah, atu isi Rabbî fanah gexxaah , meqe taama abtek hinnay uma taama abtek, tokkel atu qhiyaamah ayró kaat angoorewettooh abteemil koo galte le
Tokkel Le kitab migdak kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek, (moomintu kinnuk)
Toysa Sahalik tan fokkaaqoh (cisab kinnuk fokkaaqime le sarriinoh)
Kaadu isi marâ fanah wallitak yandabbe.(jannatal)
Kaadu Le kitab kay xiiroonih derrek kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek,(korosta kinnuk)
Toysa Sarriinoh finqaa kee baatih deerise le (seece le)
Urta girá culele tet niqna tammoysuh
Diggah usuk addunyal isi marih addal wallitak suge
Diggah usuk isi Rabbî fanah inkinnah aduure wayu waam yekkele
Yeey, Yalli kaa gacsele! diggah kay Rabbi kaa yabalih sugeeh kay caalat yaaxigeh
Yalli korta ayról ciggiila qasa caawil xiibite
Kaadu bar kee usuk gaaboyseemil (yaskatteemil) xiibite
Kaadu alsal xiibite, noori teetik duuda waqdi
Diggah gurraak gurral (caalataak caalatal) koretton sinaamey
Toysa kah aamine waanam maca loonuv? (koros kinnuk)
Kaadu Qhuraan keenil yankirriyime waqdi, Yallah kah kummaate waanaah kah rammite waanam macalon
Tonna hinnay, koroosite mari rabak lakal ugut yanim dirabboysah
Yalli yaaxigeh usun sinni sorkocobbaxittet qellissi haanam. (qinaadi kee koroosannuk)
Toysa nabiyow ken aytikumus qansarissa digaalál
Kinnih immay yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe sinni galto le akeeral
Yalli mafdagoogi le qaraanal xiibite
Kaadu Yalli isi naqoosa gaaboysu waamah xagana keenih edde hee ayrol xiibite (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Kaadu sumaaqitée kee, elle sumaaqiteynal xiibite
Moominiin elle digaaluh Baaxó dageeh qanxise mari abbarsimeh
Bocot urta gibdi girá elle ursan. (yeemene mara edde carrisoonuh)
Usun woo waqdi tet amol daffeyak yenen
Usun yeemene maral baahaanamal gaabowwu iyyeenih assalaalaquk sugen
Ken kah digaaleenim matan, Yallay mayso leeh fayla lel yeemeneenim akke waytek
Kaay qaranwaa kee baaxô mulki le (kobor le), kaadu Yalli ummaanim yabali kinniih kaak qellittam matan
Diggah moominiinih tan labhaa kee moominiinih tan sayyó girat carrise mari, tohuk lakat atoobee weenik, usun jahaannam digaalá lon. Kaadu ken carrissa digaalá lon
Diggah, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, jannatittey guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa lon, toh kaxxa maffaafa kinni.(asallama)
Diggah, ku Rabbik xibix kaxxam gibdi digaalah yabbixe wagqdi
Diggah usuk ginó suge waytik qimbisaah, ken bayseek geeral ken gacisah
Kaadu usuk dambi cabtiliiy, kacanu le Rabbi moominiinih
Qarshi le Rabbiy nabna le kinni
Isih faxxa haam abe kinni
Nabiyow isi ambiya dirabbosse Qandeh xaagi koo gufee
Firqawnaa kee samuud deqsita mara kinni
Wonna hinnay koroosite mari ku dirabboysiyyat yan
Yalli keenik derrek marot ken yabbixe
Koros kaa elle weelossa inna hinnay, usuk Qhuraanay nabna le kinni
Usuk daccarsime luucih addal yan. (lowcal macfuuz kinnuk)
Yalli qaran kee bar mira cutuktal xiibite
Kaadu maca koo tiysixxigee bar mira cutukti kinnim
Usuk bolok iyya cutuktay, diifut dite boohaysa kinni
Hebeltô nafsi mayan malaykatti dacayrih amol kaak yanih akke waytek
Toysa Seehadayti wagitay cubbusay kak ginniimem
Usuk leey (woh daacoyta kinnuk) sissikuk kaqittak ginniime
Numtin xiiron kee barrah aliilik fanak tawqe
Diggah tohuk kaa gine Rabbi kaa gacsaamah duddali kinni. rabeek lakal
Kassit! Niyaayik lubbittet qellittem fokkaqsimtaah tamballu wayta ayro (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Toysa Usuk cayla maliiy, cateyna mali
Yalli qaraanay qagaa-qagita roblel xiibite
Kaadu baaxoy teetik tawqeemit baqittal xiibite
Diggah Qhuraan yani deedalak baxissa maxcó kinni
Kaadu usuk digir hinna
Diggah usun Nabiih uma malah malsan.(koros kinnuk)
Kaadu wohuk gibdi malah anu keenih malsa cakki yambulleemkeh
Tokkel Nabiyow Ķoros qambaalis, digaalah obtit keenih maqataatakinaay dagoh gide ken qambaalis
